name: INLG 130 A100
prerequisites: Students in the Indigenous Studies program should complete INLG 133 before INLG 130.

name: INLG 300 A100
prerequisites: Completion of Certificate in Indigenous Language Proficiency offered in the same language as INLG (or FNLG) 300, including INLG (or FNLG) 200 or LING 220; or with permission of instructor.

name: INLG 333 A100
prerequisites: Completion of Certificate in Indigenous Language Proficiency; or with permission of instructor.

name: INLG 334 A320
prerequisites: Completion of Certificate in Indigenous Language Proficiency including INLG (or FNLG) 333 (or as corequisite); or permission of instructor.

name: INLG 335 A100
prerequisites: INLG (or FNLG) 130, INLG (or FNLG) 133, INLG (or FNLG) 233 or permission of instructor. Recommended: LING 360.

name: INLG 358 A320
prerequisites: Completion of Certificate in Indigenous Language Proficiency including INLG (or FNLG) 258; or permission of instructor.

name: INLG 433 A100
prerequisites: INLG (or FNLG) 332 or permission of course supervisor.

name: INLG 434 A100
prerequisites: INLG (or FNLG) 433 or permission of course supervisor. Recommended: LING 431 and 432.

name: INLG 435 A315
prerequisites: LING 220, INLG (or FNLG) 332 or permission of instructor. Recommended: LING 360, 431 and 432.

name: INLG 458 A200
prerequisites: Completion of Certificate in Indigenous Language Proficiency including INLG (or FNLG) 358; or permission of instructor.
